transcripts.text: Hello, everyone.  We're here on Block Island today, and it's my birthday today, so Chris wanted to sing Happy Birthday, and he wanted to sing it for all of you, too, so you could hear him sing, because it's very sweet when he does it, I have to tell you.  Here he is.  Okay.  Thank you.  You're going to sing Happy Birthday?
Yes.  You were doing it?  Yeah, but we're filming.  Playing overhead, people.  Playing overhead.  Happy birthday to you.  Happy birthday to you.
Thank you.  Isn't that sweet?  I wanted to get it on film for all of you.  God bless.
